Package org.apache.struts2.interceptor.exec

Interface BackgroundProcess

All Superinterfaces:
Runnable
All Known Implementing Classes:
StrutsBackgroundProcess
public interface BackgroundProcess extends Runnable
Interface used to create a background process which will be executed by ExecuteAndWaitInterceptor
